```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
#install.packages("googlesheets")
library(googlesheets)
library(DT)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
# get the Booklist sheet
data <- gs_title("Booklist")

# list worksheets
#gs_ws_ls(data)

# get the sheet
data <- gs_read(ss = data, ws = "Sheet1", skip = 0, header = TRUE)

# convert to data.frame
data <- as.data.frame(data)

# create table
n <- length(data$Title)
datatable(data, rownames = FALSE, options = list(
  pageLength = n,
  order = list(0, "asc")))
```
